ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 79
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings: You re not the only one who has had problems with the practice quest.  As off this moment the quest is completely broken and will not work, although
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings:

You're not the only one who has had problems with the practice quest. As
off this moment the quest is completely broken and will not work, although
Verant has been slow acknowleging that fact. (especially since they made a
big deal about introducing it - hehe yet another trade skill that people
have wasted coutless sums of money only to find out that it's not working)
It should be fixed in the net patch if I'm not mistaken.

Quasinom de Plume
{Mith Marr}


> Message: 1
> Date: Tue, 31 Aug 1999 23:06:17 +1000
> From: "Ben Humphreys" <benh@...>
> Subject: Practice Research
>
> Hi,
>
> I've been trying the practice research with no success. I was hoping
> someone
> was able to help me. I've researched real spells with no problem, so i'm
> wondering why this is much harder. And I refuse to believe that it is
> bugged!
>
> Basically I add Bat Wings, Bone Chips, and Lapis Laluli (sp?) to the
> Concordance of Research and hit combine. It says these items do not
> combine.
> I have tried it with the quill and paper in my inventory (not that I
> needed
> them with REAL research).
>
> I know there is a secret to this, I just don't know what it is. I'd be
> much
> appreciative if someone was able to share it with me.
>
> Regards,
> Tremor of Bristlebain
